short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small extension to see how much money you have 'invested' in CS cases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Securely track & analyze your CounterStrike Case Opening Stats!

YOUR CASE DATA, YOUR CHOICE : 
If you want to keep your cases locally, you're free to do so! 

You can see:
  - Your Most opened Items
  - The total amount of cases opened
  - All gold items you pulled
  - The number of cases you've opened since your last knife unboxing
  - The number of cases it took until you unboxed your first knife
  - Search skins by rarity or name

Over 450.000 case opening events tracked & indexed online already! 

By syncing you can: 
  - Search by Rarity, Name or DATE
  - See your longest streak
  - Amount of case types you've opened
  - See Case with most Golds (Coverts, Classified etc.) 

SUPPORTER EXCLUSIVE:

LOOTSPECTRUM RECAP
  - Get a rewind of your year in CS Cases
  - Amount of money spent on cases (excl. Key prices)
  - Most opened case of the year
  - GET IT FOR ALL PAST YEARS

HISTORIC CASE PRICE DATA
  - Get a calculation of money spent on cases (live price on the day of opening the case)
  - Filter by case

MOST LUCKIEST CASE
  - Filter cases by relative return of Golds (Coverts, Classifieds etc.)
  - Filter singular or combined rarities
  - Set minimum of cases opened to rule out outliers

AND MORE TO COME!

If you have feature suggestions, join the Discord or message me on Twitter / X!
